hero.title: Building Hope for Every Child
hero.subtitle: Supporting children and youth with special needs in Ethiopia. Together, we create an inclusive community where every child can thrive and reach their full potential.

about.title: Empowering Special Needs Children in Ethiopia
about.description: Myside Community Charity Organization is dedicated to supporting children and youth with special needs including Autism, Down Syndrome, ADHD, and Cerebral Palsy. We believe every child deserves love, support, and the opportunity to reach their full potential.
about.comprehensiveApproach: Our comprehensive approach includes educational programs, vocational training, family support services, community awareness initiatives, and therapeutic interventions that make a real difference in the lives of children and their families.

aboutPage.title: About Myside Community
aboutPage.subtitle: Empowering children and youth with special needs in Ethiopia through compassionate care, innovative programs, and community support since 2024.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: The main mission of Myside Special Needs Children/Community Charity Organization is to establish and operate a fully equipped educational and vocational training center. This center provides individualized academic programs, therapeutic support (such as speech therapy), and vocational skills development.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: A society where every child with special needs has equal opportunities to thrive, learn, and contribute to their community, supported by understanding families and an inclusive society.

values.compassion: Compassion and empathy in all interactions
values.inclusion: Inclusion and acceptance of all abilities

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: From humble beginnings to leading organization

2024.title: Foundation
2024.description: Myside Community was founded by a group of passionate educators in Addis Ababa.

2025.title: First Programs
2025.description: Launched our first educational support programs for children with autism.

2026.title: Family Support
2026.description: Introduced comprehensive family support and parent training workshops.

joinTeam.title: Join Our Team
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for passionate professionals who share our commitment to supporting children with special needs.

documents.title: Organization Documents
documents.subtitle: View our official certifications and documentation

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: We offer comprehensive programs designed to support children with special needs, their families, and the broader community through education, therapy, vocational training, and advocacy.

educational.title: Educational Support
educational.description: Specialized learning programs with individualized academic programs tailored for children with autism, ADHD, and other learning differences.

therapeutic.title: Therapeutic Services
therapeutic.description: Comprehensive therapy programs including speech therapy, occupational, and behavioral therapy to enhance development.

family.title: Family Support
family.description: Counseling, training, and support groups for families, especially for mothers and parents navigating special needs care.

vocational.title: Vocational Training
vocational.description: Vocational skills development to equip youth with special needs for fulfilling and productive lives.

community.title: Community Outreach
community.description: Awareness programs and job creation initiatives to build understanding and acceptance of special needs in the community.

programsPage.title: Empowering Every Child's Potential
programsPage.subtitle: Our comprehensive programs support children with Autism, Down Syndrome, ADHD, and Cerebral Palsy through specialized education, therapy, vocational training, and family support services.
programsPage.programsSubtitle: Comprehensive support services designed to help children with special needs reach their full potential and thrive in their communities.

educational.title: Educational Support Program
educational.description: Specialized learning support with individualized academic programs tailored to each child's unique needs and abilities, focusing on inclusive education.

features.smallClass: Small class sizes for better attention

therapeutic.title: Therapeutic Services
therapeutic.description: Comprehensive therapy programs including speech therapy, occupational, and behavioral therapy to enhance development.

family.title: Family Support Services
family.description: Empowering families with resources, training, and emotional support, including counseling especially for mothers and parents navigating the journey of raising a special needs child.

vocational.title: Vocational Training
vocational.description: Vocational skills development to equip youth with special needs for fulfilling and productive lives.

facilities.title: Our Facilities in Action
facilities.subtitle: Take a look at our safe, inclusive, and engaging environments where children explore, learn, and grow together through our various programs.

impact.title: Program Impact
impact.subtitle: Our programs have made a significant difference in the lives of children and families across Ethiopia.

story1.quote: Thanks to the early intervention program, my son with autism has made incredible progress. He's now communicating better and has made friends at school.
story1.author: Meron, Parent

story2.quote: The vocational training program helped my daughter find meaningful employment. She's now independent and confident in her abilities.
story2.author: Tadesse, Parent

testimonials.title: Voices of Our Community
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from the families and individuals whose lives have been transformed by your support.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: Through dedication and community support, we've made a meaningful difference in the lives of children with special needs and their families across Ethiopia.

childrenSupported.label: Children Supported
childrenSupported.sub: Children with special needs receiving our services

cta.title: Join Us in Making a Difference
cta.subtitle: Your support helps us continue providing essential services to children with special needs. Every contribution, no matter the size, creates lasting impact.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to learn more about our programs or how you can get involved.
contact.pageSubtitle: We're here to help and answer any questions you might have. Reach out to us and we'll respond as soon as we can.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.subject: Subject

donate.title: Support Our Mission
donate.subtitle: Your generous donation helps us provide educational and therapeutic support to children with special needs. Together, we can make a lasting difference.

howToDonate.title: How to Donate
howToDonate.subtitle: We appreciate your willingness to support Myside Community Charity Organization. You can donate via bank transfer or contact us directly to arrange your donation.

bankTransfer.title: Bank Transfer Details
bankTransfer.note: Please contact us for the complete account details before making a transfer

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.subtitle: Join our mission to support children with special needs. There are many ways to make a difference in our community.

volunteer.title: Volunteer Opportunities
volunteer.subtitle: Make a direct impact in the lives of children with special needs. Choose from various volunteer roles that match your skills and interests.

educational.title: Educational Support
educational.description: Help children with learning activities and homework assistance

therapy.title: Therapy Assistant
therapy.description: Support therapists during sessions and help with equipment

events.title: Event Coordination
events.description: Help organize fundraising events and community activities

admin.title: Administrative Support
admin.description: Assist with office tasks, data entry, and communication

application.title: Volunteer Application
application.experiencePlaceholder: Describe any relevant experience working with children or special needs...
application.motivation: Why do you want to volunteer?
application.motivationPlaceholder: Tell us about your motivation to volunteer with us...

donation.title: Make a Donation
donation.subtitle: Your generous donations help us provide essential services and support to children with special needs and their families.

25.description: Provides educational materials for one child for a month

50.description: Covers one therapy session for a child in need

100.description: Supports a family with transportation for a month

250.description: Funds specialized equipment for therapy sessions

oneTime.title: One-time Donation
oneTime.description: Make a single donation to support our immediate needs

monthly.title: Monthly Giving
monthly.description: Become a monthly donor for sustained impact

corporate.title: Corporate Sponsorship
corporate.description: Partner with us for larger community impact

directImpact.title: Direct Impact
directImpact.description: 100% of donations go directly to programs and services

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Regular reports on how your donations are used

partnership.title: Partnership Opportunities
partnership.subtitle: Join us in creating a more inclusive community. We welcome partnerships with organizations that share our commitment to supporting special needs children.

corporate.title: Corporate Partners
corporate.description: Businesses that provide financial support, employee volunteers, or in-kind donations.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Partners
healthcare.description: Medical professionals and healthcare institutions providing specialized services.

educational.title: Educational Partners
educational.description: Schools, universities, and educational institutions supporting our programs.

government.title: Government Partners
government.description: Local and national government agencies supporting policy and funding.

currentPartners.title: Our Current Partners
currentPartners.subtitle: We're proud to work with these organizations to expand our reach and impact:

becomePartner.title: Become a Partner
becomePartner.description: Ready to make a difference? Let's discuss how we can work together to support children with special needs in Ethiopia.

events.title: Events & Activities
events.subtitle: Join our community events to support our mission, raise awareness, and connect with families and supporters.

grandLaunch.title: Grand Launch Event
grandLaunch.description: Join us for the official launch of our new website and community center expansion.

gala.title: Annual Fundraising Gala
gala.description: Join us for an evening of celebration, awareness, and fundraising for our programs.

autismDay.title: World Autism Awareness Day
autismDay.description: Walk with us to raise awareness about special needs inclusion in our community.

hostEvent.title: Host Your Own Event
hostEvent.description: Organize a fundraising event in your community to support our mission. We'll provide you with all the resources and support you need.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: A visual journey through the moments that define our community. See the smiles, the progress, and the hope we build together.
